commit message:
Fix bug determining status of play to update
Show '-th' for negative numbers (slightly better than blank)
Refactor creation of play from cursor
Add a Send menu item to the PlayActivity
Refactor notification logic into a utils class
Add notifications of uploaded play

Update version code (D'oh!)
Remove duplicate release note
Correct inaccurate comment in Authenticator

Correct format of notification when deleting an unsynced play
Show a toast when saving a draft of a play
Bump version number to 4.4 and remove some compiler/IDE warnings
Use the collection thumbnail image in the CollectionFragment
Fix potential bug when calculating the IndirectFileProvider file name
Increase maximum thumbnail size to 130KB
Use game thumbnail if collection thumbnail isn't specified
Add a utility method to format lists of strings with commas and ampersands

Clear collection text properties properly
Set all TextViews on GameInfoFragment to unselectable
Show a collection tab in the GameActivity.

Display a divider between collection items
Enable clicking on a collection thumbnail

Correct apply a batch during sync
Handle missing collection item in the GameCollectionFragment
Show a '?' when the year is missing during a search
Upgrade ActionBarSherlock to 4.3.0
Use the ActionBarSherlock SearchView (now that it support suggestions)
Better handle syncing collection when one than one copy of a game is present

Make sure order of home menu items is correct, even when searching
When searching, don't show icon 1; don't ask for a shortcut refresh
Clear the (debuggable) inserts after inserting
Selectively update collection.update (only on a sync with stats and private info)
Display when a collection item needs updating
Change the conflict resolution of games to ABORT and add a similar one to collection items
To make the previous DB mods, we have to drop the collection table (due to SQL constraints)
Optionally sort comments by rating

Add more info to BuddyFragment
Improve UX of clicking a buddy row
Add a link to the thread on the geek in the About screen
Remember search text on orientation change

Fix determine play status (again!)
Fix bad null check in UpdateService
Remove old, unnecessary code
Display error message if play doesn't load correctly; enable the refresh menu item correctly
Refactor the unique player list
Improve parsing games; join on the subtype rank (instead of rank id of 1); refactoring
Allow editing of the buddy's nickname (and update plays too)
Refactor remaining notifications to use the util class
Refactor into AnimationUtils
Add the ability to update a single buddy; improve buddy parsing
Implement refresh and a tabbed view pager in BuddyActivity (last commit had the BuddyActivity - oops!)
Always allow renaming of player's play, even if the nickname is the same
Add sort order to AutoCompleteAdapter
BuddiesFragment now inherits from BggListFragment. The latter supports an image fetcher
Add a Plays tab to the BuddyActivity
Add an AlphabetIndexer to the buddies list
Buddy collection has an indexer and remembers its scroll state.
Get a sort name for a BuddyGame
Make the home action bar button work for BuddyActivity

Create section headers for buddy collection
Refactor some styles that were defined at the wrong API level

BggListFragment uses fast search by default
PlaysFragment extends BggList
Plays no longer have they're background changed based on status (screwed up the click indicator
Add section headers to buddies
Cancel a sync!
Make some sync tasks cancellable
Add more cancel support in play syncing
Add options to sync only while charging or on WiFi
Allow canceling a sync through the notification; cancel the sync on state changes; cancel the notification along with the sync
Add sections to CollectionFragment; refactor the section logic in BuddiesFragment
Center the section header; remember the scroll position in search results; refactor canceling the sync
Section the plays list and provide different empty messages based on mode.
Fix plays section header for leap years
Add a plain text action bar item and show the count on the buddy list
Show count on PlaysActivity; improve empty message; refactor to support tablet view
Handle case where updating play was deleted on the server
When updating a draft of a play, close the PlayActivity (it soon won't exist)
Improve the menuing around collections
Update ABS manifest with a min API version of 8
Add a 2 line custom action bar view

Move sort description to the actionbar
Correct selection of view when one is added or deleted
Fix bug when updating a view
Correct capitalization of menu items and when they are visible
Externalize sort description
CollectionFragment retains its scroll position on rotation
Use a CAB instead of a context menu for deleting colors

Add menu option to generate colors
Remove unused colors
Update release notes
Switch to a CAB in PlaysFragment
Replace context menu with CAB in search results

Add CAB support to collection and hotness
Add an icon to the link to BGG menu option
Conditionally display the play/log play options
Hotness retains its scroll position
Move common menu options into a base class and make sure all activities inherit from it (except edit forms, like logging plays)
Implement navigation drawer (work in progress)
Set searchable threshold to 2 (not 0)
Add images and separators to navigation list; another attempt to show activated row
Upgrade to the new support library

Replace the dashboard with a welcome screen
Move the cancel sync option to the base menu
Hide search menu item when drawer is open on Collection (they conflict with one another)
Refactor strings
Better handle the re-login scenario
All activities show the navigation drawer
Remove code redundancies in SearchResultsActivity and TopLevelActivity.
Rework sort data to show better info (in wishlist and play time especially)
Improve UI of play fragment
Improve UI of play fragment some more
Improve UI of play logging
Rework sort data to show better info (in wishlist and play time especially)
Handle a null fragment (from Search Results) and update due to new Android tools
Save last viewed timestamp on a game; add a null default for a column in SelectionBuilder; correct bug in getDoubleAsString in CollectionSortData

Allow saving a view even if it hasn't changed (for renaming)
Allow saving a view with no filters, only sort order
Don't display the fast scroll letter if it's blank
Sort by last viewed
Update release notes; only show a game's play tab if plays are set to sync
Work around activated bug to show selected navigation item; select the correct row by default
Improve game tabs when signed out
Fix crash while filtering (null check)
Upgrade to SDK and support library 18 and ABS 4.4.0
Correct parsing of sort index in buddy collection
Improve activity switching from nav drawer
Change sign out to remove account instead of clearing the password; start home activity when signing out
On successful sign in, start appropriate activity
Use cached authtoken for hashed password instead of user data. Store the plain text password and use it to sign in when expired.
Log the user out if they're using the old auth technique
Add ability to view buddy collection by different status; update release notes
Update some styles to look more modern
Don't automatically show the keyboard when logging plays (or players)
Change color of the filter info in the CollectionFragment
Update style of login activity and robustify the login process
Collapse bi-directional sorts into 1 menu item each
Fix parsing of a game's number of plays
Tagging version 4.4
